record.title: CONSOLIDATED NATURAL RESOURCES ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED
record.narrative:
CONSOLIDATED NATURAL RESOURCES ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED -- (Senate - April 04, 2008)

[Page: S2607]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask that we move to proceed to Calendar No. 616, the Forest Service, Departments of Interior and Energy resources bill, and send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

We, the undersigned Senators, in accordance with the provisions of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, hereby move to bring to a close debate on the motion to proceed to Calendar No. 616, S. 2739, Forest Service, Departments of Interior and Energy Resources bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask unanimous consent that the mandatory quorum required under rule XXII be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
